title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder is changing with the settings.
EB: When reopening the hyperlink builder, the title becomes "www.actuate.com" instead of "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com".
2. Click on "OK" and then reopen the hyperlink builder.
